[Econometrics](https://www.econometrics-with-r.org/index.html)

This book is a good reference for anyone interested by learning how to apply Data Science, in particular Econometric techniques in the areas of time series analysis and dynamic causal effects, which can be particularly relevant when developing forecast models in many industries.
